name: Primes p == 3, 9, 11 (mod 20) such that 2p+1 is also prime.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Robert A. J. Matthews, Maximally periodic reciprocals, Bull. Institute of Mathematics and Its Applications, vol. 28, p. 147-148, 1992.
maple: q:= p-> irem(p, 20) in {3, 9, 11} and andmap(isprime, [p,2*p+1]):
program: (PARI) is(n)=my(k=n%20); (k==3||k==9||k==11) && isprime(2*n+1) && isprime(n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 20 2014
author: _Robert A. J. Matthews_
